title: Adequate Housing Hard To Find In Boom Towns For Oil, Gas
teaser: When you think of oil and gas towns, most people visualize a lot of transient workers, increased crime, and RV parks. But plenty of oilfield workers do move to town with their families. The challenge is finding these families adequate housing.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
